definitions.title: 1. f.
definitions.body: sister of Aaron Ex 15:20 (E), and of Moses and Aaron Nu 26:59 (P), 1Ch 5:29; named also Ex 15:21 (E), Nu 12; Nu 1, Nu 12:4, Nu 12:5, Nu 12:10, Nu 12:10, Nu 12:15, Nu 12:15, Nu 20:1 (all JE), De 24:9, Mic 6:4. LXX Mariam.

definitions.title: 2. m.
definitions.body: (prob.) a Judahite 1Ch 4:17. LXX to\n Maiwn, LXXL Mwewr.
